description: Hi my name is Joseph Johnson I'm 52 years old I'm single father dad Man one son looking for my true love getting married have kids start a family loving caring kind sweet smile laugh joke love hugs kisses lovable adorable tender tenderness great personality passionate passion great sense of humor great listener great communcation romantic romance honest loyal trustworthy open minded handsome man charming Man kindhearted man god fearing man confident man sports movies music dance plus many more things hope to hear from you all take care god bless you all Joseph Johnson
